events.message: Customer reported a car collision that occurred on April 30, 2024, involving their vehicle and a tree on the roadside.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident after review of the reported incident and vehicle details.
An insurance agent was assigned to handle the customer's auto accident claim and coordinate next steps.
The customer received an acknowledgment confirming the receipt and registration of their car accident claim.
The claims team requested accident photos, police report, and repair estimates to proceed with investigation.
Customer promptly submitted all requested documents including photos, police report, and repair quotes.
The investigation into the vehicle damage and accident circumstances officially began with assigned adjusters.
Investigation completed successfully confirming liability and estimate of damages to the vehicle.
A settlement offer was proposed to the customer covering vehicle repair costs after assessment.
Customer provided positive feedback appreciating the quick handling and fair settlement proposal.
The claim was officially approved and prepared for payment processing to cover repair expenses.
Payment was issued to the customer promptly for the vehicle repairs as per the approved claim amount.
The auto accident claim was closed successfully after confirmation of completed repairs and payment received.
All case files and documents related to the vehicle accident claim were archived for record keeping.
